preconditions.precondition: The system can access worker's department info, available positions, shifts, absences, and preferences from the database

mainSequence.step: Worker requests position and shift assignment
Shift Manager searches worker's department in the system
HR Department checks for the worker's department in the database
HR Department finds the worker's department
Shift Manager receives the worker's department
Shift Manager looks for available positions in the department
HR Department queries for available position
HR Department retrieves the available position
Shift Manager gets the available position
Shift Manager searches for an available shift
HR Department queries for an available shift
HR Department provides the available shift
Shift Manager obtains the available shift
HR Department verifies worker's absences and preferences
HR Department checks worker's shift preferences
HR Department returns absences and preferences
Shift Manager assigns the position and shift to the Worker
